message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds immense value to me. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you at a price of $1200000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also the potential it has to enrich your endeavors. I believe this is a mutually beneficial proposition that allows you to access a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Kindly let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
